alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:40PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Flathead County through 630 PM MDT... At 539 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitefish, or 12 miles northwest of Evergreen, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rain will cause brief reductions in visibility. Locations impacted include... Whitefish. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 123 and 136. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
